76.name: Storming the Castle
76.description: You saved Queen Jennah from an insidious plot.
76.requirement: Complete the human personal story step "Kellach's Attack," "The Queen's Justice," or "The Trap."

188.name: Sorrow's Subjugator
188.description: The mighty moletariat unites in deed and song!

bits.text: Story Mode
Explorable Mode—Koptev's Path
Explorable Mode—Rasolov's Path
Explorable Mode—Fergg's Path

223.name: The Emperor's New Wardrobe
223.requirement: Soulbind  unique piece of cultural armor.

265.name: Champion Brawler
265.description: Think you're the best? Prove it!

367.name: Hidden Garden
367.description: Unlock the hidden garden's revered treasure.

372.name: A Waddle to Remember
372.description: Shake things up as a baby siamoth.
372.requirement: Get transformed into a baby siamoth by the Skritt Burglar.

393.name: Open Grave
393.requirement: Your party killed all of the monsters in the Solid Ocean fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

580.name: Daily Tournament Matches Won
580.description: Clawing your way to first place, one match at at time.

703.name: Sanctum Sprint
703.requirement: Find and speak with the Sanctum Sprint activity master in Zephyr Sanctum.

733.name: Kiel: Maw Mulcher
733.requirement: Defeat the Jade Maw within Fractals of the Mists while supporting Ellen Kiel.

786.name: Krytan Dignitary
786.requirement: Represent Kryta in the Crown Pavilion. Escort human emissaries to hot-air balloons.

793.name: Hot-Air Balloonist
793.requirement: Travel by hot-air balloon to Divinity's Reach.

970.name: Advanced Mists Invasion Defender
970.requirement: Defeat enemy invaders in the Mists.

1117.name: The Nightmares Within
1117.requirement: Complete  event inside the Tower of Nightmares.

1265.name: Yay, Wintersday Presents!
1265.description: Oooh, I wonder what's in there.

1310.name: Marionette Dismisser
1310.requirement: Cheer for the departing twisted marionette.

1336.name: Wurm Hurdler
1336.requirement: Avoid getting hit by any of the great jungle wurm's spin attacks.

1380.name: Wurmhole Traveler
1380.requirement: Control the wurm tunnel, and then travel through one of the tunnel entrances.

1662.name: Mess with the Bull...
1662.requirement: Defeat the Inquest at the second console location as a steam minotaur without ejecting.

1678.name: Don't Knock Yourself Out
1678.requirement: Avoid being hit by attacks that cause knockback or knockdown while remaining in the room.

1684.name: Birthday—Year 4
1684.description: You have a character that is more than 4 years old.

1730.name: Trash Collector
1730.description: <c=@flavor>There must be something valuable in all this junk...</c>
1730.requirement: Collect these  junk items throughout Tyria.

1848.name: Daily WvW Veteran Creature Slayer
1848.requirement: Kill the veteran harpy, warg, or wurm located in the Borderlands in World vs. World.

1859.name: Daily Thief Winner
1859.requirement: Win  PvP match as a thief.

1970.name: Daily Maguuma Jungle Lumberer
1970.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
1970.requirement: Gather raw materials by harvesting trees in the following Maguuma Jungle maps: Caledon Forest, Metrica Province, Brisban Wildlands, Sparkfly Fen, and Mount Maelstrom.

2025.name: Daily Shadow Behemoth
2025.requirement: Defeat the Shadow Behemoth in Godslost Swamp in Queensdale.

2042.name: Ringing the Right Notes
2042.requirement: Play the correct notes in Bell Choir Ensemble.

2179.name: Revenant: Salvation
2179.requirement: Complete the Salvation revenant specialization to unlock the Mistward Plate collection.

2194.name: Vinetooth Hunter
2194.description: There's a predator lurking in the jungle, chasing anything that isn't Mordrem.
2194.requirement: Find and defeat Vinetooth Prime in its lair.

2341.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 38
2341.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2415.name: Fractal Master
2415.requirement: Complete each fractal scale from 76 to 100.

2428.name: The Dreamer III: The Lover
2428.description: Desire leads to dreams, and the passions of the heart to the yearnings of the soul. Some dreams are bright, some are dark, some are for things lost, and some are for things yet to be. Gather these fragments of dreams and desires to channel into your efforts to create the legendary precursor known as The Lover.

bits.text: Talk to Evon Gnashblade in Lion's Arch.
Talk to Ellen Kiel in Lion's Arch.
Imbue a Superior Sigil of Dreams at Ventari's Tablet in the Omphalos Chamber of the Grove.
Talk to Owain in Southsun Cove.
Dropped by steam creatures primarily found in Lornar's Pass.
Defeat the Mossman in the Swampland Fractal.
Found in the Urban Battleground Fractal chest.
Dropped by Ascalonian Ghosts.
Dropped by the Sons of Svanir.
Dropped by Nightmare Court.
Dropped by branded creatures.
Dropped by Destroyers.
Dropped by risen Orrians.
Found in the Karka Queen's chest.
Sleep in the treasure room of the Provernic Crypt in Gendarran Fields.
Found in the Font of Rhand chest.
Purchase from Legionnaire Crunchbone after assisting the charr delegation or from Vanguard Lieutenant Viles after supporting the human delegation in Fields of Ruin.
Found in the Aquatic Ruins Fractal chest.
Imbue a Superior Sigil of Dreams at the Azabe Qabar, the Royal Tombs place of power in Cursed Shore.
Dropped by Flame Legion.
Talk to Suwash once he has been made a pirate captain in Lornar's Pass.
Found in the chest after cleansing the Cathedral of Zephyrs in Malchor's Leap.
Found in the chest after cleansing the Cathedral of Verdance in Cursed Shore.
Found in the chest after cleansing the Cathedral of Eternal Radiance in Malchor's Leap.
Found in the chest after cleansing the Cathedral of Silence in Cursed Shore.
Found in the chest after cleansing the Cathedral of Glorious Victory in Straits of Devastation.
Dropped by Badazar's Champion in the Martyr's Woods in Plains of Ashford.
Imbue a Superior Sigil of Dreams at the wreckage of the Breachmaker in Lion's Arch.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Historian of the Armaments ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2438.name: The Juggernaut I: The Experimental Hammer
2438.description: The wonders of the stone and soil, carved by nature and by sentient races, exude both power and stability. Meditate on these great places in order to take your first steps in creating the legendary precursor known as The Colossus.
2438.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

bits.text: Ponder the Mighty Oouo rock formation in the Guilty Tears region of Timberline Falls.
Ponder the Godskull rock formation found in the Apostate Wastes region of Fireheart Rise.
Ponder the statue of an Ascalonian Hero inside the Urban Battleground Fractal.
Ponder the twisted faces formed by the rotting trees of Wychmire Swamp in Caledon Forest.
Ponder the ruins of the Temple of the Ages in Queensdale.
Ponder the Serenity Temple in the Blazeridge Steppes.
Ponder the statue of Lord Beetlestone found in Beetletun in Queensdale.
Ponder the Statue of Jora found at the Wurmhowl Spikes of the Wayfarer Foothills.
Ponder the statue of Ferro the Butcher that was erected in the Black Citadel.
Ponder the statue of Kalla Scorchrazor that was erected in the Black Citadel.
Ponder the statue of Boles Deathrain that was erected in the Black Citadel.
Ponder the statue of Nox Darkheart that was erected in the Black Citadel.
Ponder the statue of Ofela Soulcleave that was erected in the Black Citadel.
Ponder the statue of Violo Raptorgaze that was erected in the Black Citadel.
Ponder the statuary created by Eir Stegalkin in Stonewright's Steading.
Ponder the Elonian statue overlooking the entrance to the Ossan District of Divinity's Reach.
Ponder the statues decorating the Rurikton district of Divinity's Reach.
Ponder the Cobiah Marriner statue in the memorial to the fallen in Lion's Arch.
Ponder the Victory Cenotaph erected at Charr's Triumph in the Plains of Ashford.
Ponder the memorial statue located within the fortress of Ebonhawke.
Ponder the statue of Balthazar after cleansing the Cathedral of Glorious Victory.
Ponder the Cathedral of Eternal Radiance after cleansing it of Orrian corruption.
Ponder the Cathedral of Zephyrs after it has been cleansed of Orrian corruption.
Ponder the Cathedral of Verdance after cleansing it of Orrian corruption.
Ponder the Cathedral of Silence after cleansing it of Orrian corruption.
Kneel before the Champion Giant when he attacks the town of Nageling in Diessa Plateau.
Kneel before Kol Skullsmasher, who resides near the Hidden Ourobon in the Harathi Hinterlands.
Kneel before the Legendary Sand Giant in the Unswept Uplands of Dry Top.
Kneel before Gort, who resides in Kessex Hills near the Cereboth Canyon.
Kneel before Fen, who resides near the Bonerattler Caverns of the Harathi Hinterlands.
Kneel before Tomtom, who resides in Lornar's Pass near Stonescatter Wash.
Kneel before the Colossus in the Cliffside Fractal after freeing him from his bonds.

2532.name: Skritt Salvager
2532.requirement: Loot a skritt burglar's treasure chest.

2567.name: Firestorm Extinguisher
2567.requirement: Defeat the Molten Firestorm before defeating the Molten Berserker in the first phase of the encounter, then defeat the upgraded Molten Berserker in the second phase of the encounter in the Molten Boss fractal.

2630.name: Sunrise III: Dawn
2630.description: A shining light of a new day reveals all and banishes the darkness to the deeper haunts of Tyria. Use your crafted Illuminator to gather the light throughout the land in your journey to create the legendary precursor known as Dawn.

bits.text: Recipe purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
Use the Illuminator to capture the Cluster of Light in the Hidden Garden jumping puzzle in Mount Maelstrom.
Use the Illuminator to capture the light at the top of the Cliffside Fractal.
Use the Illuminator to capture the light at the top of the Lion's Arch Lighthouse.
Use the Illuminator on the Pyrite Peninsula in Malchor's Leap.
Use the Illuminator to capture light from the wreck of the Golden Vanity in Cursed Shore.
Pick up a luminous plant in the Aquatic Ruins Fractal and use the Illuminator to capture its light.
Loot this after killing the Thaumanova Anomaly in the Thaumanova Fractal, and use the Illuminator to capture its light.
Use the Illuminator to capture the light of the glowing ice pillar in Underground Facility Fractal.
Use the Illuminator to capture the light after killing Mai Trin in her boss fractal.
Use the Illuminator to capture the light near the end chest of the Branded Mine jumping puzzle in Fields of Ruin.
Use the Illuminator to capture the light near the end chest of the Chaos Crystal Cavern jumping puzzle in Iron Marches.
Use the Illuminator to capture the light of the glowing waterfall in Demongrub Pits in Queensdale.
Use the Illuminator to capture the light near the end chest of the Collapsed Observatory jumping puzzle in Kessex Hills.
Use the Illuminator to capture one of the sunbeams in the cavern near the end of the Fawcett's Bounty jumping puzzle in Harathi Hinterlands.
Use the Illuminator to capture the light of energy beams at the top of the Second Aetherblade Site in Gendarran Fields.
Use the Illuminator to capture a glowing stream of ley-line energy in the Cavern of the Shining Lights in Dry Top.
Use the Illuminator to capture the light near the teleportation stone at the bottom of Griffonrook Run in Lornar's Pass.
Use the Illuminator to capture the light at the purified Dwayna shrine in Malchor's Leap.
Use the Illuminator to capture the light of the hidden grotto in the Grove.
Use the Illuminator to capture the light on the island at the end of the Skipping Stones jumping puzzle in Southsun Cove.
Use the Illuminator to capture the light near the Dwayna statue in the Ruins of Holy Demetra in Harathi Hinterlands.
Use the Illuminator to capture the sunbeam in the caves near Krok's Ruin in Frostgorge Sound.
Use the Illuminator to capture the sunbeam in the treasure room of the Loreclaw Expanse jumping puzzle in Plains of Ashford.
Use the Illuminator to capture the light near the ghostly pirate treasure at Fort Cadence in Sparkfly Fen.
Use the Illuminator to capture the sunbeam in the caves near Lightfoot Passage in Straits of Devastation.
Use the Illuminator to capture the sunbeam in the Unguent Den in Mount Maelstrom.
Use the Illuminator to capture the sunbeam in the hidden cave behind Jeztar Falls in Metrica Province.
Use the Illuminator to capture one of the light beams at Luminates Plant in Metrica Province.
Use the Illuminator to capture light from the glowing plants at Aurora's Remains in Brisban Wildlands.
Use the Illuminator to capture the light of the glowing green beam in the Thaumanova Reactor in Metrica Province after the shield is disabled.
Use the Illuminator to capture the Sloftly Glowing Light skill challenge in Gendarran Fields.
Use the Illuminator to capture the phosphorescent glow from the light of the Inquest terminals in the Aetherblade Fractal.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Historian of the Armaments ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2649.name: Denied
2649.requirement: Deny Gorseval from consuming any spirits during your victorious battle.

2711.name: League Slayer—Champion
2711.description: Completing this achievement awards an item for Path of the Ascension III: Monument of Legends.

2760.name: Primordial Legend
2760.requirement: Cross 6 league-division thresholds during a single PvP season.

2800.name: Dragon's Heart

2816.description: Win or lose, you see it through to the end.

2948.requirement: Complete Aetherblade at fractal scale 76 or higher.

3120.requirement: Slay the the champion karka near Ashen Skerries.

3139.description: It has destruction on its mind.

3257.name: The Bells of Wintersday
3257.requirement: Complete songs in Bell Choir Ensemble.

3321.name: It's Just a Game
3321.description: "They'd make us play for their amusement."
3321.requirement: Defeat the Mursaat Overseer game piece and win the prison game.

bits.text: New Loamhurst

Story Instance: Heart of the Volcano

"A Scan a Day..."

3401.name: Arrival and Survival

3533.name: Block the Shock

Story Instance: "Where's Balthazar?"

3630.name: Desert Highlands Insight: Discarded Vessels
3630.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in the Desert Highlands.

3673.name: Enemy of My Enemy
3673.description: Journal: Enemy of My Enemy Completed

3717.name: Crystal Oasis Insight: Sanctum of Nabkha
3717.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in Crystal Oasis.

3725.name: Leap of Knowledge
3725.requirement: Dive from the highest point in Kormir's library.

3762.name: Final Sting

bits.text: Found in a cobwebbed room deep inside Derelict Delve.

4014.name: Who's Laughing Now?
4014.description: Laughing in the face of danger.

4058.name: The Bells of Wintersday

4178.name: Master Diver: Iron Marches
4178.description: This chest can be reopened once per week or per completion of the Master Diver achievement.
4178.requirement: Find and open the sunken chest in Iron Marches.

4238.name: I'm Brave, You Know
4238.requirement: Assist a would-be hero in his noble charge, ideally with as many witnesses as possible.

4281.name: Gauntlet Contender
4281.requirement: Defeat  Queen's Gauntlet boss in the Crown Pavilion during the Festival of the Four Winds.

4387.description: Joko didn't discourage literacy, but the choice of reading materials was somewhat constrained.
4387.requirement: Find enough books in Jahai Bluffs to make a library for the children of Sun's Refuge.

A book about the history of another continent.
A book about a spiny creature's friends.
A book about the alphabet, approved by Joko.
A book about growing your own potted cactus.

A book about a magical feline.
A book about rampaging choya.
A book about the hunger and yearning of dolyaks.
A book that teaches children about springer safety.
A book about honoring your elders.

4625.requirement: Complete  annual Lunar New Year achievement. This achievement can be completed once every year.

4629.requirement: Unlock the warclaw tail armor by looting it from guards.

4665.name: Skyscale of Courage
4665.requirement: Infuse your skyscale egg with courage.

bits.text: Go to Fort Trinity in Straits of Devastation and tell your egg how you defeated Zhaitan.
Go to Camp Resolve in the Silverwastes and tell your egg how you defeated Mordremoth.
Go to King Joko's Sky Garden in the Domain of Vabbi and tell your egg how you defeated Balthazar.
Go to Pact Command in Dragonfall and tell your egg how you defeated Kralkatorrik.
Defeat your doppelganger at Augury Rock in Elon Riverlands.

4694.name: Skyscale of Fire
4694.requirement: Infuse your skyscale egg with fire.

bits.text: Speak with Grand Elder Fire Djinn Naayih or Grandmaster Elder Djinn Emine at Zagonur Cliffs in the Domain of Vabbi. Defeat nearby foes to draw the djinn out.
Get burned by lava in the Great Imperial Smelter in the Black Citadel.
Get burned by lava within Mount Maelstrom.
Get burned by lava in the Hearth in the Domain of Vabbi.
Get burned by lava in the fire chamber in Derelict Delve in Desert Highlands.

4759.name: Mystic Forge "Researcher" III
4759.requirement: Donate goods to the "very scientific" research into the Mystic Forge's secrets in Lion's Arch.

4867.name: (Annual) Mantle Mauler
4867.requirement: Kill  White Mantle cultist in the Crown Pavilion. This achievement can be completed once every year.

5879.name: (Bonus) Strike Back: Whisper of Jormag
5879.requirement: Complete the Whisper of Jormag Strike Mission.

5943.name: Course Favorite: Grothmar Valley
5943.requirement: Complete the Grothmar Grand Tour or Crater Circuit races or adventures.

5953.name: Return to The Test Subject
5953.requirement: Complete the story mission The Test Subject in Living World Season 4 Episode 2.

5960.name: End Conjecture
5960.requirement: After completing the meta-achievement Return to the Dragonstorm, visit Taimi and Gorrik at the Eye of the North.

6004.name: Ore Miner: Thunderhead Peaks
6004.requirement: Mine ore  times in Thunderhead Peaks.

6105.name: Seitung Province Insight: Zen Daijun Cat Island
6105.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in Seitung Province.

6119.name: Seitung Province Insight: Camp Peaks
6119.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in Seitung Province.

6123.name: Got Her Back
6123.description: Does this make you an honorary Aetherblade?
6123.requirement: Keep Mai from being interrupted by jade guard mechs while she's disabling security.

6136.name: Seitung Prison Springer Ride
6136.description: While springers excel at high jumping, taking the high road isn't always their best route.
6136.requirement: Ride a springer from the bells of the Seitung Prison to the shrine on Cat Island in under 1 minute without dismounting or teleporting.

6203.name: To Greater Heights
6203.description: Though they lie shattered and broken, they may yet recover an ounce of their lost glory.
6203.requirement: Recover a remnant of the Kurzicks and restore it.

6224.name: World Class Fisher
6224.description: <c=@flavor>The charm of fishing is in pursuing something elusive, though attainable. It is a simple yet profound practice of hope.</c>
6224.requirement: Collect  different fish from the waterways of the world.

bits.text:
Found in bodies of water all across the world.

6230.name: Canthan Wanderer
6230.requirement: Complete the Wandering Cantha daily meta-achievement in End of Dragons  time.

6324.name: Daily End of Dragons Vista Viewer
6324.description: Always on the lookout for a good view.
6324.requirement: View a vista in one of the following End of Dragons locations: Seitung Province, New Kaineng City, Echovald Wilds, or Dragon's End.

6334.name: Echovald Wilds Insight: Mori Village
6334.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in the Echovald Wilds.

6393.name: Avid Saltwater Fisher
6393.description: <c=@flavor>The charm of fishing is in pursuing something elusive, though attainable. It is a simple yet profound practice of hope.</c>
6393.requirement: Collect  different fish from the world's bodies of saltwater.

6458.name: Valdhertz Victor
6458.requirement: Complete all the rooms of Valdhertz in a single run.

6468.name: Seitung Province Meta-Event
6468.requirement: Defeat the Aetherblade leader in Haiju Plains.

6494.name: Renowned Adventurer: Seitung Province
6494.requirement: Complete all of the renown hearts located in Seitung Province.

bits.text: Demonstrate your fishing skills to the village fishermen.
Monastery Training
Assist the temple in its defense.

6497.name: I Brought Flowers
6497.description: It never hurts to be prepared for any occasion.
6497.requirement: Pick up a bouquet from the flower merchant to bring to Marjory and Kasmeer's gathering.

6559.name: The Aetherblade Retreat
6559.requirement: Complete the story chapter The Aetherblade Retreat.

6583.name: Defeating World Bosses II
6583.requirement:
Defeat  of the world bosses in Bloodtide Coast, Blazeridge Steppes, or Harathi Hinterlands.

<c=@reminder>World bosses are challenging events that appear at specific times of day across Tyria. Defeat them to receive chests containing rare equipment and crafting materials. </c>

6600.name: Leveling Up I
6600.requirement:
Earn experience to level up this character to level 10.

<c=@reminder>Experience can be earned by defeating enemies, contributing to events and renown hearts, completing story chapters, and crafting items.</c>

6619.name: League Conqueror—2v2 Season Seven
6619.requirement: Win  ranked matches during 2v2 Season Seven.

6654.name: Defeating Veterans in the Ruins of Orr
6654.requirement: Defeat  veterans in the Straits of Devastation, Malchor's Leap, or the Cursed Shore.

6786.name: Scarlet's End
6786.requirement: Complete the story chapter Scarlet's End.

6831.name: Reflective Koi Weapon Collection
6831.requirement: Unlock all  Reflective Koi weapon skins in your wardrobe.

6943.name: Daily Tier 2 Silent Surf
6943.requirement: Complete Silent Surf at fractal scale 26 or higher.

6945.name: Daily Tier 3 Silent Surf
6945.requirement: Complete Silent Surf at fractal scale 51 or higher.

7044.name: Echovald Wilds Incursions
7044.requirement: Repel Kryptis incursions in the Echovald Wilds.

7104.name: Secrets of the Obscure: Act 1 Mastery
7104.requirement: Complete  Secrets of the Obscure: Act 1 achievements.

7182.name: Amnytas Insight: Balanced Perspective
7182.requirement: Discover this Secrets of the Obscure Mastery Insight in Amnytas.

7222.name: Oblige Obscure
7222.description: A thousand secrets, and half of them are lethal. It's best not to get lost...
7222.requirement: Successfully complete events in the Bastion of the Obscure.

bits.text: Fight off the Kryptis ambush.
Collect relics for Livia and keep the Kryptis from stealing too many.
Help Livia escort the relics by shooting at Kryptis from the magic platforms.
Defeat the Kryptis boss.
Defend Researcher Lezzi as she gathers info about the kryptis rifts.
Quickly disperse the unstable rift before it explodes.
Escort Researcher Lezzi and her new data about Nayos.
Stop the Kryptis from taking the map room.
Exorcise possessed researchers.

7309.name: Black Lion Stolen Goods Recovery Event Week 3—Basic
7309.description: The Black Lion Trading Company needs your help collecting stolen goods!
7309.requirement: Collect stolen Black Lion supplies from thieving skritt during the event.

7317.name: Tower Snoop
7317.requirement: Find and read all of the confidential literature hidden throughout the Wizard's Tower.

bits.text: Confidential Report #1
Confidential Report #2
Confidential Report #3
Confidential Report #4
Confidential Report #5
Confidential Report #6
Confidential Report #7
Dagda's Diary
Thoughtfully Written Note
Fragment of Lyhr's Journal
Missing Fragment of Lyhr's Journal
Mabon's Journal: The Mursaat
Mabon's Journal: The Market
Torn Journal Page #1
Torn Journal Page #2
Torn Journal Page #3
Torn Journal Page #4
Torn Journal Page #5
Torn Journal Page #6

7612.name: WvW Rush Guard Killer
7612.requirement: Kill  enemy guard NPCs in World vs. World.

7630.name: Cruising Amnytas: Natural to Strength
7630.description: Skyscale dodges can cover a good amount of distance if you need a little boost.
7630.requirement: Ride a skyscale from the southeast courtyard at the Bastion of the Natural to the southern courtyard at the Bastion of Strength.

7678.name: Legendary Cosmic Observatory Strike Mission
7678.requirement: Complete the Cosmic Observatory Strike Mission with challenge mode active.

7765.name: Reliving the Seasons 1
7765.requirement: Complete pivotal story missions from Living World Season 1.

bits.text: Episode 1: New Friends, New Enemies
Episode 1: The Battle for Cragstead
Episode 1: Molten Furnace
Episode 2: Memorials on the Pyre
Episode 2: The Scene of the Crime
Episode 2: No More Secrets
Episode 2: Aetherblade Retreat
Episode 3: Opening Ceremony
Episode 3: Closing Ceremony
Episode 3: Scarlet's Playhouse
Episode 4: The Nightmare Unveiled
Episode 4: The Nightmare Incarnate
Episode 4: The Nightmare Ends
Episode 5: The Twisted Marionette
Episode 5: Escape from Lion's Arch
Episode 5: Battle on the Breachmaker
Episode 5: Scarlet's End

7803.name: Turret Takedown
7803.requirement: Destroy Kryptis turrets and help the fleeing Kryptis make it to the forward bivouac.

7816.name: A Record of War: Balance
7816.requirement: Complete various tasks throughout Nayos and earn the banner of the Bastion of Balance.

bits.text: Learn about the history of the Kryptis from Agathine at the Old Settlement.
Find and read the Kryptis journal on the eastern edge of Nyedra.
Complete the "Wreak havoc in the Fortress of the Founding" event.

7943.name: Room to Spare
7943.requirement: Purchase the Bauble Backpack in the World 3 Test Zone.

7987.name: Vialgos Vomit
7987.description: Who cleans up after the Kryptis?
7987.requirement:
Avoid being hit too many times by Vialgos's malignant toxin.

(Eligibility for achievement starts when you dismount on the platform. It is removed if you are hit too many times or leave the platform.)

8031.name: Free Kryptis Essence: Silver
8031.requirement: Earn a silver medal or better in the Free Kryptis Essence adventure.

8054.name: Barely a Scratch
8054.description: The outrider should invest in a pair of boots—there's a lot of sharp objects in the citadel.
8054.requirement: Ensure Arina's health does not drop below 80% as she descends the Spire of Creation and sieges the hatchery.

8131.name: Revenge of the Destroyer Twins (Weekly)
8131.requirement: Slay either the legendary Destroyer Aestus or the legendary Destroyer Ignis near the Boiling Sea.

8196.name: Shard Scouter
8196.requirement: Discover  interesting locations with large Bloodstone Shards.

bits.text: Slithering Outskirts: By a tree whose roots are spread out.
Slithering Outskirts: A lone tree glowing bright.
Moldering Greenwood: Take caution when going down stairs to an underground cave.
Dead Lab: Four large shards surrounded by jade constructs and ether towers.

8236.name: Janthir Syntri Adventure: View From the Top
8236.requirement: Locate the View from the Top Adventure in Janthir Syntri.

8357.name: High Dive
8357.description: I can see my homestead from here!
8357.requirement: Achieve gold on the View from the Top adventure.

8381.name: Local Response: Domain of Kourna (Weekly)
8381.requirement: Complete  events in the Domain of Kourna.

8417.name: Local Response: Crystal Oasis
8417.requirement: Complete  events in Crystal Oasis. Bounty events award additional progress.

8430.name: Road of Victory II
8430.requirement: Earn Proofs of Glory through high placement in monthly tournaments.

8493.name: Infinite Trebuchet
8493.requirement: Complete all tasks to unlock the Infinite Trebuchet.

bits.text: Purchase a trebuchet token from the skirmish supervisor.
Purchase a trebuchet mechanism from the skirmish supervisor.
Complete the associated siege expertise achievement.
Purchase trebuchet parts from the blue catmander in the Alpine Borderlands.
Salvage parts from the broken down trebuchet on the third floor of Stonemist Castle.
Visit Canis in Alpine Borderlands and bow to him.

8500.name: Ballista Expertise
8500.requirement: Damage enemy siege equipment 30 times with a ballista.

8502.name: Undefeated: Mount Balrior
8502.description: No more worshipping titans. You can go back to collecting rocks and having picnics.
8502.requirement: Defeat  bosses in Mount Balrior without any party members being defeated.

bits.text: Greer, the Blightbringer
Decima, the Stormsinger
Ura, the Steamshrieker

8513.name: League Participator—Conquest Season Forty-Four
8513.requirement: Play  ranked matches during Conquest Season Forty-Four.

8561.name: Wayward Wayfinder
8561.description: Journal: Into the Valley of Shadow
8561.requirement: Test Isgarren's patience by not following his command while moving through the valley.

8563.name: Mistburned Barrens Insight: Grand Athenaeum
8563.requirement: Discover this Janthir Wilds Mastery Insight in Mistburned Barrens.

8565.name: Home Sweet Homestead: Amnytas
8565.description: These decorations are yours, Wayfinder. YOURS!
8565.requirement: Complete events in Amnytas. Group events will award more progress.

8567.name: The Wayward Wisp: Wisp Sighting
8567.requirement: Complete events across Mistburned Barrens to draw forth the wayward wisp.

8588.name: Mistburned Barrens Insight: The Golden Lake Overlook
8588.requirement: Discover this Janthir Wilds Mastery Insight in Mistburned Barrens.

8624.name: Restless No More
8624.requirement: Help the southern survey team put vengeful souls to rest.

8630.name: Home Sweet Homestead: Dragon's Stand
8630.description: Who dares defy my eternal homestead?
8630.requirement: Complete events in Dragon's Stand. Group events will award more progress.

8644.name: The Wayward Wisp: Welcoming the Wisp
8644.description: It has a kind, welcoming aura.
8644.requirement: Complete your quest and bond with the wayward wisp.

8682.name: Rolling Competitor: Shoreside Sprint
8682.requirement: Complete 15 laps of the roller beetle race in Southsun Cove. (This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure.)

8755.name: Close the Door
8755.description: Don't let it hit you on the way out.
8755.requirement: Successfully complete the Destroy Charged Jade and Close Titan Rifts event without losing the point for more than 30 seconds.
